sentence.Network_en: He'll be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia.
sentence.Network_cn: 他将要访问4个城市，包括萨迪尼亚的卡利亚里。

sentence.Network_en: This sighting occurred during my dive to a sunken wreck off Sardinia.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是我在撒丁岛附近的沉船残骸处潜水时所见的景象。

sentence.Network_en: Sardinia and Corsica lie on the flank of the long Italian boot.
sentence.Network_cn: 撒丁与科西嘉位于意大利靴形半岛之侧面.

means.word_mean: 1. the Italian region on the island of Sardinia; the kingdom of Sardinia was the nucleus for uniting Italy during the 19th century
2. an island in the Mediterranean west of Italy
